{
    public event global::System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventHandler? PropertyChanged;
    /// <summary>
    /// Gets or sets the Name value.
    /// </summary>
    /// <remarks>
    /// Generated from the backing field _name.
    /// </remarks>
    public string Name
    {
        get
        {
            return _name;
        }

        set
        {
            if (SetProperty(ref _name, value))
            {
                OnPropertyChanged("FullName");
            }
        }
    }

    protected void OnPropertyChanged([global::System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallerMemberName] string? propertyName = null)
    {
        PropertyChanged?.Invoke(this, new global::System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs(propertyName));
    }

    private bool SetProperty<T>(ref T field, T value, [global::System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallerMemberName] string? propertyName = null)
    {
        if (global::System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer<T>.Default.Equals(field, value))
        {
            return false;
        }

        field = value;
        OnPropertyChanged(propertyName);
        return true;
    }
